text: Veria may refer to: *Veria, a town in northern Greece, also known as Veroia and (in classical antiquity) Beroea *Veria, Laconia, a village in the municipality Oinountas, Laconia, Greece *Véria, Jura, a commune in eastern France *Beroea, the ancient Greek name for Aleppo, Syria *Veria Living, a former name for the television network Z Living
title: Veria (disambiguation)
